output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mint function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a malicious contract to steal arbitrary tokens.
mint function generates a pseudo-random token amount, allowing attackers to control the minted token supply.
transfer function allows attackers to transfer any tokens to any address, allowing asset theft.
transferFrom function allows attackers to transfer any tokens to any address, allowing asset theft.
